derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from French, from medieval Latin affiliatio(n-), from the verb affiliare (see affiliate)

entry.tran: （组织之间的）密切联系，隶属关系
entry.def: If one group has an affiliation with another group, it has a close or official connection with it.

example.ex: The group has no affiliation to any political party...
example.tran: 该团体不隶属于任何政党。

example.ex: The officer cited the federation's rule on affiliation.
example.tran: 该官员引用了联邦政府对于隶属关系的规定。

entry.tran: （个人之间或个人与组织之间的）联系，从属关系
entry.def: If you have an affiliation with a group or another person, you have a close or official connection with them.

example.tran: 约翰逊就职于耐克鞋业公司

example.ex: They asked what her political affiliations were.
example.tran: 他们询问她属于哪个政党。
